original: Koch, Ernst, advokat, Göteborg, f. 20/7/97 i Barmen, Preussen, av fil. dr Karl K. o. EI’ise Braeer. — Stud :ex. v. GbgS’ h. latin 15, jur. kand. i Sthlm 20. E. o. not. i Göta hovr. 20, tings-tjg. i Sevede o. Tunaiäns härads doms. .23, egen adv :verksamh. i Gbg sed. 25. Led. av Sv:e(S adv:samf. sed. 27.
translated: Koch, Ernst, lawyer, Gothenburg, born on July 20, 1897 in Barmen, Prussia, son of Dr. Karl K. and Else Braeer. - Completed high school studies at Gothenburg Latin School in 1915, graduated with a law degree in Stockholm in 1920. Became an assistant notary in the Gothenburg Court of Appeal in 1920, served as a court clerk in the Sevede and Tunaiäns district courts in 1923. Established his own law practice in Gothenburg in 1925. Became a member of the Swedish Lawyers' Association in 1927.

parent.name: Dr. Karl K. and Else Braeer
